meanings.definition: The quality or state of being capable of being put into practice.
meanings.sent1: Her ideas had the practicablenesses needed to succeed.
meanings.sent2: The team discussed the practicablenesses of their project before starting.
meanings.sent3: The practicablenesses of his plan made everyone smile with approval.
meanings.sent4: The practicablenesses of the solution shone like a beacon in the dark.
meanings.sent5: She demonstrated the practicablenesses of her theory through a simple experiment.

meanings.definition: The feasibility or possibility of being carried out or accomplished.
meanings.sent1: The practicablenesses of the new policy were questioned by the team.
meanings.sent2: We need to consider the practicablenesses of implementing this change.
meanings.sent3: His confidence in the practicablenesses of his idea was infectious.
meanings.sent4: The practicablenesses of the plan were like a key unlocking a door to success.
meanings.sent5: The teacher illustrated the practicablenesses of the concept with a hands-on activity.
